definition: rhyolite (extrusive igneous rock, chemically equivalent to granite)
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Low-zirconium rhyolite has been successfully used as emulsifier in manufacturing emulsified glaze.
sentences.chinese: 用低鋯流紋岩作爲乳濁釉中的乳濁劑，獲得了成功。

sentences.english: People come to this area in order to see the colorful rhyolite mountains.
sentences.chinese: 許多人來到這裏爲了欣賞色彩各異的流紋岩山。

sentences.english: Hydrocarbon reservoir is discovered in the Mesozoic rhyolite by drilling.
sentences.chinese: 經鑽探，在該區中生界流紋岩中發現了油氣藏。
